thread.title: In Shocking News, Veteran Actor Om Puri Dies After Suffering A Heart Attack
thread.title_full: In Shocking News, Veteran Actor Om Puri Dies After Suffering A Heart Attack

title: In Shocking News, Veteran Actor Om Puri Dies After Suffering A Heart Attack
text:
facebook 
It's shocking to learn that veteran actor Om Puri is no longer with us. Early this morning, due to a massive heart attack, the actor passed away. He was just 66 years old. Social activist and filmmaker, Ashoke Pandit posted about his demise on Twitter and offered his condolences. Sad & shocked to know that versatile actor Om Puri jee has expired due to heart attack early morning today. #RIP . ‚Äî Ashoke Pandit (@ashokepandit) January 6, 2017 
The incredible actor had been in the movie industry for decades. We all grew up watching his films like Jaane Bhi Do Yaaro, Gupt, Chachi 420 and more. He is also well remembered for his roles in blockbusters like Bajrangi Bhaijaan, OMG: Oh My God, Don 2, Dabangg, Kurbaan, Hera Pheri, Singh Is King, Pyaar To Hona Hi Tha ... the list is endless. He was indeed, an excellent actor. Several Bollywood personalities have tweeted the same. Sad to hear about the passing away of the very talented Om Puri, my co-actor in many films...heartfelt condolences to the family. #RIP ‚Äî Akshay Kumar (@akshaykumar) January 6, 2017 Goodbye Om! A part of me goes with you today. How can I ever forget those passionate nights we spent together talking about cinema & life ? ‚Äî Mahesh Bhatt (@MaheshNBhatt) January 6, 2017 RIP Om Puri.We have lost one of our finest.A talent, A Voice, A Spirit.Will miss you Puri Saab. ‚Äî Boman Irani (@bomanirani) January 6, 2017 Solid actor....Solid filmography....immense talent.... #RIPOmPuri ....cinema has truly lost a brilliant artist.... ‚Äî Karan Johar (@karanjohar) January 6, 2017 It's a sad day for cinema ... we just lost one of our greats... gone but will never be forgotten ... #RIPOmPuri Saab ... ‚Äî Neha Dhupia (@NehaDhupia) January 6, 2017 Shocked to know that the immensely talented actor #OmPuri passed away. Big loss to our film industry. RIP üôè ‚Äî Madhur Bhandarkar (@imbhandarkar) January 6, 2017 Omji... I will miss that warm tight hug that you gave me every morning on set. Khudahafiz sir... you were the best! ‚Äî Kabir Khan (@kabirkhankk) January 6, 2017 So long Omji. Prided myself on being his friend peer & admirer. Who dare say my Om Puri is no more ? He lives through his work. ‚Äî Kamal Haasan (@ikamalhaasan) January 6, 2017 
We give our heartfelt condolences to his family and friends. May his soul rest in peace. Photo Credit: BCCL
